project.title: HTML, CSS AND  JAVASCRIPT
project.description: A fruit shop website is a digital platform designed to provide customers with a convenient and easy way to buy fresh fruits online. The website is a reflection of the physical fruit shop, showcasing the available fruits and vegetables, prices, and other related products

project.title: Angular
project.description: A Blood Bank Management System is a software application designed to automate the operations of a blood bank. It's primary responsibility is to design, develop, and maintain an efficient system that meets the specific needs of blood banks

project.title: React.js
project.description: Create a simple mini book website in React where you can display a list of book items with their names, images, and descriptions.Users can click on a search book to see more details, and you can also include a search feature to filter books
